techmeme.title: Sources: Sierra, an AI agent startup co-founded by Bret Taylor, is raising hundreds of millions of dollars in new funding led by Greenoaks at a $4B+ valuation (The Information)
WordPress.org adds a checkbox to confirm users aren't "affiliated with WP Engine in any way, financially or otherwise" before they log in or register an account (Samantha Cole/404 Media)
OpenAI says it has disrupted 20+ operations and deceptive networks in 2024 so far that tried to use its models, including four that had election-related content (Hayden Field/CNBC)
Indian insurance firm Star Health says it suffered a "malicious cyberattack", about two weeks after hackers put 31M customers' alleged personal data on Telegram (Jagmeet Singh/TechCrunch)
Grabango, which provided cashierless checkout tech and raised $73M+, shuts down after failing to "secure the funding it needed to continue providing service" (CNBC)
